channel.title: epic meele fight with alien grunt
channel.description:
So, one day when playing through lambda, I got too close to an alien grunt and well, this happened
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OkrMxWUXNWY&feature=player_embedded[/url]
when you get close to the alien grunt he will only meele, and then epicness ensues.
I´d like to say I planned the end all the way along, added a fitting fanfare sound to the background to enhance the moment.
I like to make things seem realisitc, that´s why I kind of swing slowly when attacking and the crowbar dealing less damage
EDIT: hm... I don´t remember putting this in the show off section, I though It was ok in the cafeteria...

item.title: epic meele fight with alien grunt
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
Haha, this is fabulous, I should try this from now on… it’d save me ammo AND save me health from their killer hornets!

People keep saying it should be faster, though it seems fast enough to me. But perhaps that was due to the horizontal distortion.

MDIGN:

[COLOR=‘Black’]But really, it’s stretched too much. Makes my head hurt.

Your head is weak.

Read full topic
item.source: epic meele fight with alien grunt

item.title: epic meele fight with alien grunt
item.dc:creator: Tehstrelok
item.description:
Bloodshot:

I do agree the charge should be faster, as well they should have more health.

Design wise, I absolutely love them, and I really did not like the original Agrunts for some reason.

ye, for that fight I had to dicrease the crowbar damage so it wouldn´t end so fast

Read full topic
